Uses of Interface
com.github.koshamo.fiddler.EventHandler

  • Packages that use EventHandler 
    Package Description
    com.github.koshamo.fiddler
    The main package contains all the classes needed for a standard fiddler based application
    com.github.koshamo.fiddler.jfx
    This package contains classes to integrate Fiddler with the Java FX framework

    • Uses of EventHandler in com.github.koshamo.fiddler

      Methods in com.github.koshamo.fiddler that return EventHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventHandler Event.getSource()
      get the sender of this message
      EventHandler Event.getTarget()
      get the target of this event.
      Methods in com.github.koshamo.fiddler with parameters of type EventHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MessageBus.registerAllEvents(EventHandler handler, MessageBus.ListenerType type)
      register your EventHandler to listen for every event type, that is send through the message bus.
      void MessageBus.registerDataEvents(EventHandler handler, MessageBus.ListenerType type)
      register your EventHandler to listen for data events, that are send through the message bus.
      void MessageBus.registerMessageEvents(EventHandler handler, MessageBus.ListenerType type)
      register your EventHandler to listen for message events, that are send through the message bus.
      void MessageBus.registerRequestEvents(EventHandler handler, MessageBus.ListenerType type)
      register your EventHandler to listen for request events, that are send through the message bus.
      void MessageBus.unregisterAllEvents(EventHandler handler)
      unregister your handler from receiving all events
      void MessageBus.unregisterDataEvents(EventHandler handler)
      unregister your handler from receiving data events
      void MessageBus.unregisterMessageEvents(EventHandler handler)
      unregister your handler from receiving message events
      void MessageBus.unregisterRequestEvents(EventHandler handler)
      unregister your handler from receiving request events
      Constructors in com.github.koshamo.fiddler with parameters of type EventHandler 
      Constructor and Description
      DataEvent(EventHandler source, EventHandler target, M meta, T data)
      The constructor must be called by any subclass.
      Event(EventHandler source, EventHandler target)
      The basic constructor uses only source and target of events.
      ExitEvent(EventHandler source, EventHandler target)
      The constructor of the exit event.
      MessageEvent(EventHandler source, EventHandler target, java.lang.String message)
      The constructor needs the message sender and optionally the message target.
      RequestEvent(EventHandler source, EventHandler target, M meta)
      The constructor needs the message sender and optionally the message target.

    • Uses of EventHandler in com.github.koshamo.fiddler.jfx

      Classes in com.github.koshamo.fiddler.jfx that implement EventHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FiddlerFxApp
      As Java FX is a standalone framework for GUI based applications, it needs some special code to integrate this framework with Fiddler or any other framework.
